# uptimekuma_notification_nextcloudtalk (Resource)

Nextcloud Talk notification resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Basic Nextcloud Talk notification
resource "uptimekuma_notification_nextcloudtalk" "example" {
  name               = "Nextcloud Talk Notifications"
  host               = "https://nextcloud.example.com"
  conversation_token = "abc123token"
  bot_secret         = "your-bot-secret"
  is_active          = true
  is_default         = false
}

# Nextcloud Talk notification with silent options
resource "uptimekuma_notification_nextcloudtalk" "silent" {
  name               = "Silent Nextcloud Alerts"
  host               = "https://cloud.example.org"
  conversation_token = "room-token-xyz"
  bot_secret         = "another-bot-secret"
  send_silent_up     = true
  send_silent_down   = false
  is_active          = true
  is_default         = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bot_secret` (String, Sensitive) Bot secret for authentication and message signing.
- `conversation_token` (String, Sensitive) Conversation/room token for the target chat.
- `host` (String) Nextcloud instance host URL.
- `name` (String) Notification name

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `send_silent_down` (Boolean) Send DOWN notifications silently.
- `send_silent_up` (Boolean) Send UP notifications silently.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
